name: Virtual VCR: The Colors of Modern Rock
overview: The Colors of Modern Rock is a disc containing six music videos, published by Sega and Warner Custom Music, which can be played through the Sega Mega-CD, and was available through a special mail-in offer from Sega. It was developed by Digital Pictures as part of a planned series of titles called Virtual VCR, also set to feature Prince and the N.P.G.: Diamonds and Pearls and March of Time in its lineup.
